attributes.action: Get pay more than the minimum wages during the Christmas period in retail stores
attributes.background:
We should get pay more than the minimum wages during this times of the year! Because of how busy our stores get , and also because of how stressful it is!!
It's not worth £4.65ph or £5.55ph with all the task that we need to achieve at this time of the year. So let's try to make a change at this..
